channel.title: Building Drop Down menus
channel.description:
[font=Verdana][u][b]Requirments: Photoshop, Fireworks 8 with Dreamweaver 8 (or cs3 editions)[/b][/u][/font]
[b]-NOTE: I DID NOT MAKE THIS, AND REALLY DON'T UNDERSTAND HOW THIS WORKS, BUT I'M POSTING THIS SO YOU GUYS CAN HAVE A SHOT-[/b]
I. Organize & Plan Your Website Design a. Logo-Header Design b. Page Color c. Background Color d. Navigation Normal e. Navigation Rollover f. Footer g. File Management II. Slice (open your psd file, has to be psd for some reason and slice) a. Header Area b. Each Navigation Link c. Content Area d. Footer e. Simple Rollover III. Rollovers a. Layers- Normal ON b. Frames Panel—Duplicate Frame 1 c. Frame 2 i. Turn off Normal Layers ii. Turn on over layers d. Preview e. Save PNG IV. Pop-up Menus a. Click on O Nav Link b. Create Pop-up Menu c. Text d. Link V. Crop & Export a. Crop Header Area -> Export b. Ctrl-Z Ctrl-Z c. Crop Nav Area -> Export d. Ctrl-Z Ctrl-Z e. Crop Footer Area -> Export f. Ctrl-Z Ctrl-Z VI. Build Template in Dreamweaver a. Define Site b. DIV Tag structure c. Insert Fireworks HTML d. Update NAV Links e. Insert Editable Region f. Make Template

[font=Verdana]Requirments: Photoshop, Fireworks 8 with Dreamweaver 8 (or cs3 editions)[/font]

-NOTE: I DID NOT MAKE THIS, AND REALLY DON’T UNDERSTAND HOW THIS WORKS, BUT I’M POSTING THIS SO YOU GUYS CAN HAVE A SHOT-

I. Organize & Plan Your Website Design
a. Logo-Header Design
b. Page Color
c. Background Color
d. Navigation Normal
e. Navigation Rollover
f. Footer
g. File Management
II. Slice (open your psd file, has to be psd for some reason and slice)
a. Header Area
b. Each Navigation Link
c. Content Area
d. Footer
e. Simple Rollover
III. Rollovers
a. Layers- Normal ON
b. Frames Panel—Duplicate Frame 1
c. Frame 2
i. Turn off Normal Layers
ii. Turn on over layers
d. Preview
e. Save PNG
IV. Pop-up Menus
a. Click on O Nav Link
b. Create Pop-up Menu
c. Text
d. Link
V. Crop & Export
a. Crop Header Area -> Export
b. Ctrl-Z Ctrl-Z
c. Crop Nav Area -> Export
d. Ctrl-Z Ctrl-Z
e. Crop Footer Area -> Export
f. Ctrl-Z Ctrl-Z
VI. Build Template in Dreamweaver
a. Define Site
b. DIV Tag structure
c. Insert Fireworks HTML
d. Update NAV Links
e. Insert Editable Region
f. Make Template
